item.description: Image: Hasbro Will the film give game designer Lizzie Magie her due? Margot Robbie‚Äôs production company LuckyChap, fresh off multiple Academy Award nominations for its blockbuster hit, Barbie, is ta...
item.content:encoded: Image: Hasbro Will the film give game designer Lizzie Magie her due? Margot Robbie‚Äôs production company LuckyChap, fresh off multiple Academy Award nominations for its blockbuster hit, Barbie, is taking on a new challenge ‚Äî a film based on the board game Monopoly. The announcement was made Wednesday at CinemaCon. But unlike Barbie, where the climax centered around the toy‚Äôs original female creator as embodied by the diminutive Rhea Perlman, the circumstances behind the creation of Monopoly are...

item.description: Image: Frictional Games Amnesia: The Dark Descent took out the action and changed horror games forever The first time I played Amnesia: The Dark Descent, I had to put it down and walk away. I‚Äôm a bi...
item.content:encoded: Image: Frictional Games Amnesia: The Dark Descent took out the action and changed horror games forever The first time I played Amnesia: The Dark Descent, I had to put it down and walk away. I‚Äôm a big fan of horror games, and I don‚Äôt usually put them down unless they‚Äôre unplayable or just bad. The Dark Descent was different, though, a game that freaked me out so badly that I had to turn the lights on and just sit in that glow until I could catch my breath. My vision had become too dark; I was o...

item.title: Overwatch 2 is making good guys bad, bad guys good in a new mirror universe mode | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Blizzard Entertainment Mirrorwatch will give us a truly evil Mercy Blizzard is giving the heroes and villains of Overwatch new allegiances in season 10 of Overwatch 2, thanks to a new Mirrorwa...
item.content:encoded: Image: Blizzard Entertainment Mirrorwatch will give us a truly evil Mercy Blizzard is giving the heroes and villains of Overwatch new allegiances in season 10 of Overwatch 2, thanks to a new Mirrorwatch mode coming to the competitive hero shooter. That means heroic versions of baddies like Widowmaker, Doomfist, and Sombra, and villainous versions of good guys Reinhardt, Tracer, and Brigitte. The inverted good and evil roles aren‚Äôt just simple skins, however. As shown in a launch trailer for new...

item.content:encoded: Image: Bethesda Game Studios/Bethesda Softworks PS5 and Xbox Series X players will get 60 frames per second and more on April 25 Conveniently timed following the release of the Fallout TV show, Bethesda has announced that its most recent mainline Fallout game, Fallout 4, will be getting a free next-gen update for PS5 and Xbox Series X. According to a post on the official Fallout blog on Thursday, console players will finally get a next-gen version of the 2015 game in a native application, whic...

item.content:encoded: Image: Evil Empire/Motion Twin Platformers, deck builders, shooters, and more The allure of the roguelike sells itself: rewarding repetition and the tantalizing hope that your next run, whether because of the new tools you‚Äôve gathered, the new skills you‚Äôve developed, or the new stats you‚Äôve buffed, will be more successful than the last. Roguelikes are difficult to stop playing because, more often than not, you‚Äôre improving in some way. Although roguelikes‚Äô surge in popularity is still a recen...

item.description: Image: Universal Pictures Emergency meeting! John Carpenter‚Äôs 1982 movie The Thing ends with its few remaining characters in a desperate spot. Faced with an alien creature that can infect, assimilat...
item.content:encoded: Image: Universal Pictures Emergency meeting! John Carpenter‚Äôs 1982 movie The Thing ends with its few remaining characters in a desperate spot. Faced with an alien creature that can infect, assimilate, and emulate human bodies, the survivors don‚Äôt know who among them might secretly be an alien, or whether their pyrrhic efforts have eliminated the infection. item.content:encoded: Do you want to know how to run LLMs on your computer without installing a lot of dependencies or writing code? Well, you're in luck! By the end of this tutorial, you will have successfully run an LLM using llamafile and interacted with it through a user-friendly interface.
